text: @CMOIreland @roinnslainte @HSELive Like a lot of people in Ireland, I've took the advice of @CMOIreland &the government &thankfully have not contracted Covid19 so I'll take this advice too. It's one summer not travelling. I've gotten this far. it will be a #staycation for me. #SupportLocalBusinesses
